title: How to change the composition of soil to make it more loamy - Quora

response.answer_text: Your question implies that you want to change soil texture; you cannot However you can increase workability, nutrient and water holding capacity of soil by adding manure a yearly or two yearly basis. It would also improve hydraulic properties of soil.
Put organic matter into it. Cow-manure is a traditional source. So are household table scraps. MH
